# modm:architecture:interrupt: Interrupt Service Routines



## Content

```cpp
// Define
#define MODM_ISR(vector, ...)
#define MODM_ISR_CALL(vector)
#define MODM_ISR_DECL(vector)
#define MODM_ISR_NAME(vector)
```
